text: I still haven’t get any solution.

You’re trying to trigger workflow with webhooks, right?
If so, know that you can only update records using this method, you cant create records.
The unique property you set up should have a match in your records in HubSpot.
If you try to create, you won’t have any error in the response. The workflow will “only” not be triggered without knowing it...
(not sure it answers the question though...)
